docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Passion of the Embryos,'' by Frank Rich (column, July 23): In the summer of 2001, President Bush made a decision to allow federal financing for medical research on a limited stock of human embryonic stem cell lines that were already available.
docs.abstract: Dr John Mendelsohn letter say he believes research on embryonic stem cells will lead to important advances in biomedical research and new approaches to treatment of disease (July 23 Frank Rich column)
